firestore.reasoning: A fresh backend definition was requested to resolve persistent permission errors. This new structure correctly defines rules for the 'users' and 'messages' collections. The '/users/{userId}' path is now correctly restricted so that users can only read and write to their own documents, fixing the profile update errors. The '/messages/{messageId}' path allows any authenticated user to read and write, fixing the chat page error. This configuration is secure and aligns with the application's functionality.
